A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I have never considered leaving a review till now.

Glad to see I'm not the only one.

Snoke goes out like Boba Fett (ie a bitch) Rey turns out to be nobody\, and about a half hour of wasted time that was passed off as comedic relief.

Seriously the movie could have been a half hour shorter.

There were some great scenes\, but far too many poor moments that eclipse them entirely.

What a disappointment. J J Abrams did it right\, despite reliving a new hope. 

Last Jedi... The name is right. It'll be the last Jedi movie I see in theaters\, that's for sure.
